titles.title: A bill to designate certain Bureau of Land Management land in the State of Oregon as wilderness, to authorize certain land exchanges in the State of Oregon, and to convey certain Bureau of Land Management land in the State of Oregon to the city of Mitchell, Oregon, and Wheeler County, Oregon, for economic and community development purposes.
Sutton Mountain and Painted Hills Area Preservation and Economic Enhancement Act
Sutton Mountain and Painted Hills Area Preservation and Economic Enhancement Act
Sutton Mountain and Painted Hills Area Preservation and Economic Enhancement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
